required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Improving Access To Services to Community Based Outpatient Clinics (CBOC's)
clinical_study.official_title: Improving Access To Services With An Intensive Two-Day Treatment For Panic

lead_sponsor.agency: Michael Debakey Veterans Affairs Medical Center

clinical_study.source: Michael Debakey Veterans Affairs Medical Center

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine the feasibility of delivering IPCT in three rural VA community based outpatient clinics (CBOCs).

detailed_description.textblock: We will first need to develop a more thorough understanding of the potential barriers associated with implementing this novel form of treatment in these settings by conducting focus groups at each facility. This information will then be used to modify the treatment, which will then be piloted with Veterans enrolled in these clinics who have panic disorder.

primary_outcome.description: IPCT is a manualized treatment that consists of psychoeducation about panic disorder, behavioral exercises such as breathing retraining and interoceptive exposure to mimic symptoms during an actual panic attack, and cognitive restructuring (identifying thought distortions and replacing them with corrective thoughts based on realistic appraisals).

intervention.description: A manualized treatment that consists of psychoeducation about panic disorder

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- OEF/OIF/OND Veteran with current diagnosis of panic disorder with or without agoraphobia (presence of other anxiety disorders is acceptable)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Current substance dependence
- psychosis
- symptomatic bipolar disorder
- severe depression with suicidal intent or plan

overall_official.affiliation: Michael E. DeBakey VA Medical Center

facility.name: Michael E. DeBakey VA Medical Center and CBOC's (Lufkin, Texas City, and Conroe)

responsible_party.organization: Michael E. DeBakey VA Medical Center
